item.title: Safety issue, 24th January
item.description:
Property renovations to the property adjacent to roundabout. The owner has installed a fence and wall which restricts the vis splay. Fence 6ft and wall over 1m both seem to be to high and stop visibility of on coming traffic.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 35, Berens Way, St Paul's Cray, Greater London

item.title: Noisy manhole cover, 24th January

item.title: Drain had collapse / sitting lower than it should be, 24th January
item.description:
The main pot hole has been fixed earlier this week, however the drain is still sitting lower (dropped) than the tarmac causing a big enough jolt tthat could cause a puncture and is unavoidable due to the narrow bend it sits on with on coming traffic Due to this you have to slow to a crawl to go down it or await oncoming traffic to pass, plus the drain is still not draining away after heavy rain causing a large deep puddle
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmstead Lane, Elmstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
